name: AIDetailTable
title: AI Detail Table
description: Detailed table view showing individual runs for drill-down analysis with sorting and filtering
functionalRequirements:
## Detail Table Requirements

### Core Functionality
- Display individual run records in a sortable table
- Show key fields: timestamp, name, success status, tokens, cost, execution time
- Color-coded success/failure indicators
- Sortable columns with visual indicators
- Paginated results for large datasets
- Export to CSV functionality
- Expandable rows for additional details

### Table Features
- Responsive column widths
- Hover row highlighting
- Sticky header during scroll
- Loading state for data updates
- Empty state message

dataRequirements.description: Receives detailed run data from parent component

technicalDesign:
## Technical Design

### Props
- data: Array of run records
- activeTab: Current view context (agents/prompts)

### Table Management
- Client-side sorting
- Pagination with 25 rows per page
- Column sorting state management
- Row expansion for details

properties.name: data
properties.description: Array of run records to display
